Today in Pembrokeshire, it's looking solid with 6 ft @10s WSW swell and light 10 mph NW winds. Spots like Abereiddy and Whitesands Bay are firing, especially during their best tide windows. Tomorrow, the swell drops to 4 ft @9s with similar winds, still offering fun waves at the same spots. By the day after, conditions worsen with 7 ft @8s SW swell and fresh 31 mph SSW winds, making it blown out. Best: today.
